  • 方法详细资料

    • accept

      boolean accept()
      Return true if this indexing handler can start.
      返回:
      True if able to start

    • startUp

      void startUp() throws Exception
      Start the indexing handler.
      抛出:
      Exception - e

    • shutDown

      void shutDown()
      Shutdown the indexing handler.

    • clearIndex

      void clearIndex()
      Clear the index.

    • createDocuments

      void createDocuments(List<Document> documentList)
      Index a list of documents.
      参数:
      documentList - All documents

    • createFiles

      void createFiles(List<File> fileList)
      Index a list of files.
      参数:
      fileList - All files

    • createDocument

      void createDocument(Document document)
      Index a new document.
      参数:
      document - Document

    • createFile

      void createFile(File file)
      Index a new file.
      参数:
      file - File

    • updateDocument

      void updateDocument(Document document)
      Update an indexed document.
      参数:
      document - Document

    • updateFile

      void updateFile(File file)
      Update an indexed file.
      参数:
      file - File

    • deleteDocument

      void deleteDocument(String id)
      Delete a file or a document.
      参数:
      id - ID

    • createAcl

      void createAcl(String sourceId, PermType perm, String targetId)
      Create an ACL.
      参数:
      sourceId - Source ID
      perm - Permission type
      targetId - Target ID

    • deleteAcl

      void deleteAcl(String sourceId, PermType perm, String targetId)
      Delete an ACL.
      参数:
      sourceId - Source ID
      perm - Permission type
      targetId - Target ID

    • findByCriteria

      void findByCriteria(PaginatedList<DocumentDto> paginatedList, List<String> suggestionList, DocumentCriteria criteria, SortCriteria sortCriteria) throws Exception
      Searches documents by criteria.
      参数:
      paginatedList - List of documents (updated by side effects)
      suggestionList - Suggestion of search query (updated by side effects)
      criteria - Search criteria
      sortCriteria - Sort criteria
      抛出:
      Exception - e
